title: 3A screen black,wont turn on
content:
Hi,
Holding power button continuously to get it to start.
Charging while holding in power button with black screen.
Holding power on and vol down/up.
Taping screen.
Unable to start phone. Battery originally over 90% then placed in pocket. Unable to wake up / turn on phone about 1 hour later.
Have read numerous posts about trying to start phone to no avail.
Tried to ring phone ,goes to voicemail.
Sim card removed and reinserted.
Any thing else I should try?
Regards Shaun Jenkins
